title: Makepung (Buffalo Races) (Half-day)
overview: Experience the excitement of Makepung, Bali's traditional buffalo races in Jembrana.

stops.description: Arrive and watch the thrilling buffalo races.

title: Makepung Festival & West Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day at the Makepung buffalo races and exploring West Bali's unique culture.

stops.description: Arrive and watch the buffalo races.
Explore Jembrana or visit local markets and attractions.
